data.message: in reference to the comment above, it would be really nice if the "View Comments" button will be back. And since I'm an online seller, it'll be really helpful if photos from different albums can be uploaded at the same time, just like before..because it's so time consuming if you can only uploads photos from one album at a time..since,in my part, photos are placed in different albums so it's everything is organized for my online business. Thank you.
